vote.title: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with Energy Resources, Inc., for additional work associated with the dredging of the pond located within Watercrest Park at Lake Highlands Town Center - Not to exceed $499,605.67, from $2,800,700.00 to $3,300,305.67 - Financing: Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($100,305.67) and Skillman Corridor TIF District Fund ($399,300.00)
